t: My new listings are missing the description and key features, please help
s: I follow the recommended steps, have registered my brand, and fill in the relevant info including pictures, descriptions and keywords. Initially everything looks fine, a day later, the key features or description is missing from the product page (sometimes even both are missing).

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia

The service provides discounts up to 80% for generic drugs and up to 40% for branded drugs for Prime subscribe users.
